scripts.build-project: cd submodules/tf_modules/project && rm -Rf vendor && terrafile install
scripts.build-env: cd submodules/tf_modules/env && rm -Rf vendor && terrafile install
scripts.build-ou: cd submodules/tf_modules/ou && rm -Rf vendor && terrafile install
scripts.build-snapshots: cd submodules/snapshots && rm -Rf vendor && terrafile install
scripts.build-terraform: cd terraform && rm -Rf vendor && terrafile install
scripts.terrafile: npm run build-project && npm run build-env && npm run build-ou && npm run build-snapshots && npm run build-terraform
